item.title: Screeen Sharing During Video Call - WhatsApp
item.description:
About WhatsApp:

WhatsApp by Meta is a completely free and secure messaging and calling app. WhatsApp is trusted by over 2B people across 180 countries making it one of the world’s best trusted communication apps. What we really love about WhatsApp is its complexity and speed. To know more about WhatsApp visit Meta, WhatsApp or Wiki.

Latest Update:

In the latest release 2.24.8.81 on 17th April 2024, WhatsApp introduced a new feature Screen sharing during video calls with minor updates in the app.
